meta.description: Optimize the distribution of annotation tasks between two companies to minimize cost while meeting image annotation requirements.

sets.name: COMPANIES
sets.description: The two companies available for outsourcing annotations.

params.name: rate
params.description: Annotation rate in images per hour for each company.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per hour for each company.

params.name: total_images
params.description: Total number of images that need to be annotated.

vars.name: hours
vars.description: Number of hours allocated to each company for annotation.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of annotation by distributing hours between companies.

constraints.name: total_images_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure that the total number of annotated images meets the requirement.

constraints.name: specialized_minimum_work_constraint
constraints.description: At least a third of the total work must be allocated to the specialized company.
